DOC.detailed_description: The plan dose level 5 mg/mL EBI-005 ( Group 1 ) 20 mg/mL EBI-005 ( Group 2 ) . A total 8 subject dose group subject randomize ratio 6:2 , EBI-005 : placebo . Treatment administration Group 2 proceed follow review safety data Group 1 . In group , subject randomize active treatment receive EBI-005 right eye placebo leave eye . Subjects randomize placebo receive placebo eye .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male and/or female age 18 65 year Medically healthy Best correction vision great equal 20/40 eye Nontobacco/nicotinecontaining product user minimum 6 month prior dose Tolerate topical administration eye Signed dated , Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve informed consent form ( ICF ) prior protocolspecific screening procedure History presence significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , hematological , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic ( include sensitive skin face ) , neurological , psychiatric disease , clinically significant disease deem acceptable PI History primary malignancy , exception basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin cervical carcinoma situ malignancy curatively treat evidence disease least 5 year Occurrence active seasonal allergy include ocular allergy ( e.g . ; annual hay fever ) Abnormalities follow ophthalmological examination : abnormality cornea , evidence ocular inflammation ( dry eye , blepharitis , allergic conjunctivitis , iritis , uveitis ) , glaucoma , optic neuropathy Subjects history laser refractive surgery ( laser assist stromal insitu keratomileusis [ LASIK ] , photorefractive keratectomy [ PRK ] ) , radial keratotomy ( RK ) , corneal transplantation , dry eye , radiotherapy eye Use contact lenses currently within past one year Positive urine drug/alcohol cotinine test
